Source.Name: slirp4netns
Source.Summary: User-mode networking for unprivileged network namespaces
Source.Description: slirp4netns allows connecting a network namespace to the Internet in a completely unprivileged way, by connecting a TAP device in a network namespace to the usermode TCP/IP stack ("slirp").

Package.Name: slirp4netns
Package.Summary: User-mode networking for unprivileged network namespaces
Package.Description: slirp4netns allows connecting a network namespace to the Internet in a completely unprivileged way, by connecting a TAP device in a network namespace to the usermode TCP/IP stack ("slirp").
